articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description:
JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon says he ‚Äúshouldn‚Äôt ever use the word hurricane‚Äù when warning about the U.S. economy. However, he insisted that there are ‚Äústorm clouds‚Äù that ‚Äúcould be a hurricane.‚Äù
 
JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon on US Economy
 
The chief executive of global investment bank JPMorgan Chase, Jamie Dimon, discussed the U.S. economy in an interview with Fox Business Tuesday.
 
Regarding his previous warning about an incoming economic hurricane that everybody should brace for, Dimon said:
 

I shouldn‚Äôt ever use the word hurricane.
 
He clarified: ‚ÄúWhat I said was there were storm clouds which may mitigate, and people said, ‚ÄòOh, he doesn‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a big deal.‚Äô So I said, ‚ÄòNo, those storm clouds could be a hurricane.'‚Äù
 
The JPMorgan boss emphasized that he is not predicting a speci‚Ä¶
articles.title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon on US Economy: ‚ÄòI Shouldn‚Äôt Ever Use the Word Hurricane‚Äô

articles.author: Best Owie
articles.description:
For a while now, Shiba Inu has been revealing some interesting partnerships. A couple of days ago, the official Twitter page of the meme coin teased a new partnership with luxury car manufacturer Bugatti when it tagged it in a post. However, it is no longer just speculation as Shiba Inu has confirmed the partnership.
 
Shiba Inu Unveils Bugatti Partnership
 
Shiba Inu revealed on Twitter that it had partnered with the Bugatti Group, the makers of the popular Bugatti automobiles. The partnership was for the upcoming NFT collection for the meme coin which will see the Bugatti Group host special events for Shiba Inu. The events include a Twitter Space and a mint party for the Shiboshi mint.
 
 
Early supporters and holders of the Shiba Inu NFT genesis collection will be able to mint these NFT‚Ä¶
articles.title: Shiba Inu Unveils New Partnership, SHIB Trade Volume Spikes

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description:
The recently approved Brazilian cryptocurrency law will likely be reviewed and revised by the newly inaugurated government of Luis Inacio ‚ÄúLula‚Äù Da Silva. According to statements made by the former rapporteur of the law, Expedito Netto, the new government will likely review the law to include some issues that were left behind for its approval.
Brazilian Crypto Law Still Not Final, Former Rapporteur States
The recently sanctioned Brazilian cryptocurrency law will likely be reviewed by the newly appointed congress of the country, according to statements made by its former rapporteur, deputy Expeditto Netto. Netto explained that the changes proposed in the law are not definitive yet, as the project might go into discussion once again to review some of the issues left behind for the sake of it‚Ä¶
articles.title: Brazilian Cryptocurrency Law Likely to Be Reviewed by Lula‚Äôs Government

Founder and CEO of Ava Labs, Emin G√ºn Sirer, said the collaboration was a ‚Äúbig deal‚Äù and, in comparison with other blockchain announcements that involved AWS, he insisted that this partnership is ‚Äúmeaningful.‚Äù
 
Founder and CEO of Ava Labs, Emin G√ºn Sirer, Comments on Collaboration with Amazon Web Services
 
According to Ava Labs, the company behind the blockchain network Avalanche (AVAX), the firm has partnered with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to ‚Äúaccelerate enterprise, institutional, and government adoption of blockchain.‚Äù The team published the announcement on Jan. 11, 2023, and said that AWS will support ‚Ä¶
articles.title: Ava Labs Partners With Amazon Web Services to Accelerate Blockchain Adoption, AVAX Jumps 16%

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency community is discussing the new ‚ÄúGame of Thrones‚Äù non-fungible token (NFT) assets that were launched on the NFT marketplace niftys.com. The ‚ÄúBuild Your Realm‚Äù collection sold out on Jan. 10, the day it was released. However, there have been complaints from fans, with some calling the NFTs ‚Äúpoorly drawn‚Äù and others criticizing the ‚Äúsalad fingers‚Äù featured in the NFTs of Game of Thrones characters.
 
Game of Thrones Fans Embrace New NFT Experience, Despite Criticism Over Character Design
 

 
Game of Thrones (GoT) is a popular fantasy television series adapted from George R. R. Martin‚Äôs series of novels ‚ÄúA Song of Ice and Fire,‚Äù and on Jan. 10, 2023, the show‚Äôs first NFTs were released. The ‚ÄúGame of Thrones: Build Your Realm Hero Box‚Äù NFT collection sold out on the Nifty‚Äôs‚Ä¶
articles.title: Game of Thrones NFTs Sell Out Quickly, But Draw Criticism for ‚ÄòPoorly Drawn‚Äô Characters

articles.author: BtcCasey
articles.description:
The country‚Äôs legislative body has completed the next step towards the issuance of El Salvador‚Äôs bitcoin bonds.
El Salvador has voted to pass a bill which paves the way for the issuing of President Nayib Bukele‚Äôs bitcoin bonds. 
The plan, which was announced in November 2021, would entail El Salvador issuing $1 billion in bonds on Blockstream's Liquid Network, a federated Bitcoin sidechain. The goal of the bond issuance would be to invest half of the money into bitcoin, and the other half into infrastructure necessary to build out the bitcoin industry in the Central American country. The bonds, according to the statement at the time, would yield 6.5% and enable a fast-track for investors to acquire citizenship in the country. 
Exactly one year after the announcement of the plan, the bill that was voted on today was introduced by El Salvador‚Äôs Minister of the Economy Maria Luisa Hayem Brev√© to the country‚Äôs legislative assembly as the next step towards this plan. With today‚Äôs approval, the country is much closer to making the bitcoin bonds a reality.

El Salvador‚Äôs Bitcoin Office released a statement in response to the vote that read in part, ‚ÄúToday El Salvador builds on our first-mover advantage by passing landmark legislation establishing a legal framework for all digital assets that are not bitcoin. The law also paves the way for the volcano bonds which we will soon begin issuing.‚Äù 
In a statement to Bitcoin Magazine, Max Keiser, a Bitcoin educator and advocate who has also been a major proponent for El Salvador‚Äôs adoption of bitcoin since the process began, states that he believes ‚ÄúThis is one of the most important milestones yet. Making Bitcoin legal tender in September, 2021 put El Salvador on the global financial map. This new law furthers the mission of President Bukele by establishing a foundation for a new global, digital securities layer built on Bitcoin.‚Äù
articles.title: El Salvador‚Äôs Legislature Approves Landmark Digital Securities Bill Paving Way For Bitcoin Bonds

articles.author: BtcCasey
articles.description:
Analysis shows that even though the mining industry saw major pressure this year, the network hashrate still grew immensely.
Hashrate Index has released its 2022 Bitcoin Mining Year In Review, an extensive report on the mining industry and markets surrounding it. 

2022 was a difficult year for Bitcoin mining, with the bear market leading to a hashprice all-time low, bankruptcies and losses for miners. Despite this, hash rate still grew 41%, and Bitcoin mining still generated nearly double the rewards compared to the previous three years. The report covers all of these topics and more in detail.
One of the main focuses of the report is the growth of hash rate. 
 
         
         
         
        Bitcoin hash rate 2022 vs. 2021 ‚Äî Source: Hashrate Index 
    
Although the year involved ‚Ä¶
articles.title: Luxor‚Äôs Hashrate Index 2022 Mining Year In Review Shows Bitcoin‚Äôs Resilience

articles.author: Muhammad Ali
articles.description:
On Wednesday, a counsel for the bankrupt crypto trading venue FTX, founded by Sam Bankman-Fried, stated that the company recovered more than $5 billion. However, the magnitude of consumer losses in its collapse was still unknown.
 
U.S. authorities have accused Bankman-Fried of organizing an ‚Äúepic‚Äù scam that may have cost investors, clients, and lenders billions of dollars; the company‚Äôs valuation was $32 billion a year ago, but it filed for bankruptcy in November.
 
 
Andy Dietderich, an attorney for the failed cryptocurrency exchange FTX, says that the company has ‚Äúrecovered $5 billion in cash and liquid coins.‚Äù The full extent of the exchange‚Äôs client deficit is ‚Äústill unclear‚Äù as they continue ‚Äúworking to rebuild transaction histories.‚Äù¬†
 
The Securities Commission of the Bahamas seize‚Ä¶

articles.description:
Since Dec. 31, 2022, ethereum‚Äôs market dominance has increased by more than 3% among the thousands of crypto assets worldwide, valued at roughly $856 billion on Jan. 11, 2023. According to coinmarketcap.com, a popular coin market capitalization aggregation site, ethereum‚Äôs crypto market dominance jumped from 18.4% to its current 19% dominance rating.
 
Ethereum‚Äôs Market Share Grows Amid Frenzied Surge in the Cryptocurrency Markets
 

 
Ethereum (ETH), the second-leading crypto market asset by market capitalization, has seen an increase in its market dominance over the past 11 days. ETH has managed to gain against the U.S. dollar, climbing approximately 0.48% during the last day. Seven-day metrics show ethereum has risen 6.55% against the greenback.
